de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.impl

Class FormatManager<T extends IPersistentFormat<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.ExtensionManager<T>
      • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.impl.FormatManager<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigFormatManager, FMFormatManager

    public class FormatManager<T extends IPersistentFormat<?>>
extends ExtensionManager<T>
    Manages additional formats for a certain object (e.g., a feature model or configuration).
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter

      • getFormatByContent

        @CheckForNull
public T getFormatByContent(java.lang.CharSequence content,
                                           java.lang.String fileName)
        Returns the format that fits the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        content - the file's content
        fileName - the file name
        Returns:
        A format that uses the given extension or null if there is none.
        In case there are multiple formats that fit the given extension, only the first one of the list is returned. In order to avoid this, please use the methods getFormatByContent(CharSequence, String) or getFormatByContent(Path), which also take into account the content that should be parsed.

      • getFormatByContent

        public T getFormatByContent(java.nio.file.Path path)
